item.title: What is life
item.description: Föreläsningar: Astronomy 141 Bra grunläggande föreläsningar. “The topics covered in this course lie at the interfaces between astronomy, chemistry, biology, geology, and the earth and planetary sciences.” Länk: http://www.astronomy.ohio-state.edu/~pogge/Ast141/ Erwing Shrödingers bok What is Life? https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/What_Is_Life%3F Forskarkurs: What is Life? http://kiwas.ki.se/katalog/katalog/kurs/2727;jsessionid=02b7dd071310a0558fbc3a80c4c7
